meanings.definition: A prize or memento awarded for a specific achievement or victory.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her shiny trophy on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The team celebrated their win by hoisting the trophy high.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the shiny trophy was a new toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the real trophy of the day.
meanings.sent5: The trophy gleamed under the bright lights of the stage.

meanings.definition: An object serving as evidence of a victory or achievement.
meanings.sent1: The trophy on his desk reminded him of his hard work.
meanings.sent2: The trophy case displayed all their past successes.
meanings.sent3: The broken trophy served as a reminder of their epic fail.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the trophy of their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The dusty trophy held memories of past glory.

meanings.definition: A memorial or reminder of a person or event.
meanings.sent1: The old trophy brought back memories of her childhood.
meanings.sent2: The trophy room was filled with stories of the past.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the trophy, creating chaos in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the trophy of their shared moments.
meanings.sent5: The trophy stood as a silent witness to history.
